title: Impossible reorg, please file an issue
body:
#### System information

Geth version: Geth
Version: 1.9.25-stable
Git Commit: e7872729012a4871397307b12cc3f4772ffcbec6
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [65 64 63]
Go Version: go1.15.6
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=go

OS & Version: linux
Commit hash : (1.9.25-stable-e7872729

#### Expected behaviour

No error message saying to file an issue.

#### Actual behaviour

Error message in logs saying to file an issue

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Start two private chain miners and let them sync. Sometimes this message appears.

Here is the log:

```
geth --http --http.addr 172.31.0.235 --http.corsdomain '*' --mine --minerthreads 1 --miner.gasprice 0 --syncmode full --networkid 1337 --etherbase '0xA57c89548A982eB90dDA1D8069b73355c2EffC34' --allow-insecure-unlock --unlock '0xA57c89548A982eB90dDA1D8069b73355c2EffC34' --password ./password

INFO [12-22|21:06:27.000] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1 txs=0 mgas=0.000 elapsed="280.204µs" mgasps=0.000 number=5687 hash="7e7065…ed9b3e" dirty=0.00B
INFO [12-22|21:06:27.000] Commit new mining work                   number=5688 sealhash="625c86…d4aa9d" uncles=0 txs=0 gas=0 fees=0 elapsed="101.683µs"
ERROR[12-22|21:06:27.000] Impossible reorg, please file an issue   oldnum=5687 oldhash="7e7065…ed9b3e" newnum=5687 newhash="7e7065…ed9b3e"
```

Do you run 2 miners with the same account? In clique you should not run the same account to run 2 mining nodes because they will generate identical blocks

btw. you can delete some of your CLI flags.
The `--minerthreads` is only needed for PoW networks.

This issue has been automatically closed because there has been no response to our request for more information from the original author. With only the information that is currently in the issue, we don't have enough information to take action. Please reach out if you have more relevant information or answers to our questions so that we can investigate further.
